Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cicero.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service from Harlem/Lake to Ashland/Lake

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
